adHeader: Affordable DJ Services specializing in International Music
adDetails: Need a DJ for your special occasion or event?? I'm an affordable DJ that will work within your budget to make your event fun & memorable. I DJ the following events: Kids birthday parties//Sweet 16 parties//Anniversary parties//Divorce parties//Baby shower parties//Backyard BBQs//Seasonal parties// Engagement parties//Holiday parties//Retirement parties//Graduation parties//Corporate events//and Weddings. I specialize in International music (Persian, Arabic, Turkish, Afghan, Bollywood, Latin, etc.) but also play Hip-Hop, Dance, House, Top 40, and the latest hits. Give me a call for your next event. Hamid show contact info
